name: Save the Kiwi
description:
CONTROLS: WASD + Space Bar + Mouse

This is a Unity3D game I made alone in 12 hours at a Hackathon in 2018. The player's objective is to save a Kiwi from a bear with a chainsaw.

Many of the assets I used are likely not royalty-free -  I was just having fun here, and wanted to share!

If I make this into a more fleshed-out project, I'll definitely be making my own art assets / commissioning someone.
